The primary goal of the SMO project is to integrate different software artifacts of existing open-source projects creating a fully functional open-source Service Management and Orchestration (SMO).

A lightweight, flexible Near-Real-Time RIC platform and SDK designed for research and experimentation.

SD-RAN is an open software-based split-RAN. It includes a near real-time RIC (nRT-RIC) and a set of exemplar xApps. The Aether nRT-RIC is cloud native and builds on ONFâ€™s well established ONOS SDN Controller.
